name: Open The Gates!
description:
“In the distance the terrible sound of marching feet can be heard. The enemy is approaching. They bring ladders and catapults. Brave archers! Man the walls. Brave knights! Protect the citizens. And Gatekeeper… Open The Gates! To war we go!”

Attack & Defend

  • Construct walls and towers to stall the enemy and prevent them from breaching.
  • Build a fearsome army to turn the tide of war and launch a siege on the enemy castle.
  • Use siege weapons such as the ladderman and the catapult to take over enemy walls.

Build & Manage

  • Construct houses, farms and inns to keep your citizens happy.
  • Build lumber camps and quarries to supply your kingdom with resources.
  • Use your resources to construct mighty armies and feed the machine of war.

Explore & Strategize

  • Construct hot air balloons and fighter jets to explore the skies for ancient temples and relics that may aid the war effort.
  • Build settlements across five enchanted worlds.
  • Use your wits to contemplate a plan and execute it. Victory will be yours!
